content.html: Sandy Hook happened 10 years ago today. At the time, people said "how many more children have to die before we do something to stop the killing?" The answer: 25,000 25,000 children killed by guns in America in the last decade. And still virtually nothing has been done.
content.value:
Sandy Hook happened 10 years ago today. At the time, people said "how many more children have to die before we do something to stop the killing?"

The answer: 25,000

25,000 children killed by guns in America in the last decade. 

And still virtually nothing has been done.
